Primary Contact: Glenna Armstrong, Interior Regional Coordinator, Interior BC Region; Email: glenna.armstrong@diabetes.ca
Service Details: - Offers education, advocates on behalf of people with diabetes, supports research and translates research into practical application- Provides an informative and interactive web site with various aspects of diabetes management, ways to give, volunteer and advocate- Learning Series presentations are available to any group size and educational events with special guest speakers are planned throughout the year- Youth and Family Camps- A large selection of literature is available at the office- Team Diabetes Information
Cost: Membership (FREE) gives the right to vote and apply for leadership positions and a full range of volunteer opportunities

Languages: English ; Printed information available in 14 languages
